overview: Ashokan lives at home with his sisters and their jobless husbands. Struggling to meet ends meet, Ashokan comes to know about his uncle's vast inheritance for him as long as Ashokan marries his uncle's daughter. The movie details how Ashokan tries to like his arrogant, disrespectful fiance but instead falls in love with the maid.
title: Manikya Chempazhukka
